name: Placeables
title: Placeables: Show items in your inventory that you can build with!
author: OmaiGrundles
description: A hotbar-inspired GUI that shows all items you can use for building that is currently in your inventory. Designed for use with megamods (Pyanodon's, Bob's / Angel's, and Krastorio for example) that add so many buildings that the hotbar can't handle them all.
